thread.title: Watch Rae Sremmurd Hilariously Deliver a Weather Forecast on French TV
thread.title_full: Watch Rae Sremmurd Hilariously Deliver a Weather Forecast on French TV

author: NHHMS
title: Watch Rae Sremmurd Hilariously Deliver a Weather Forecast on French TV
text:
Watch Rae Sremmurd Hilariously Deliver a Weather Forecast on French TV By http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/rae-sremmurd-weather-report-2017-billboard-1548.jpg 
Rae Sremmurd tried on a different occupation during a recent appearance on French television channel TMC , where the hip-hop duo delivered a weather forecast. 
Doing their best Al Roker, the real-life brothers worked the green screen as an anchor translated their musings in French. As Swae Lee warned of a frosty morning, Slim Jxmmi promised a sunny afternoon. “In the afternoon, the wind is still blowing over the country, but the weather is so sunny. It’s a beautiful day — go outside,” he said. 
Swae Lee then added, “Temperatures — it is very cold. Sacré bleu !” The pair also give a weather update on their native Tupelo, Mississippi. 
During their appearance, Rae Sremmurd also performed their Hot 100 chart-topper “Black Beatles” and “Swang.” 
Watch Rae Sremmurd’s debut as weathermen below.​
